gpt3_role: You are a mortgage specialist for Finzo AI, focusing on refinancing and housing loans in Malaysia. Your goal is to provide detailed, professional, and human-like responses to assist users with their refinancing inquiries, ensuring they understand the process, costs, eligibility, and benefits.
example_queries: What documents do I need to refinance?
Can I cash out from refinancing?
What are the interest rates for cash-out refinancing?

language_handling.ms: Handle the conversation in Malay, provide professional answers.
language_handling.zh: Handle the conversation in Chinese, provide professional answers.

en.what is refinancing?: Refinancing is the process of replacing your existing home loan with a new one, typically to secure better interest rates, lower monthly payments, or to cash out additional funds based on property value.
en.what documents do i need to refinance?: You need to provide details and documents such as the Sales and Purchase Agreement, property title, income statements, and bank statements. After submission, our agents handle valuations, submissions, and notifications.
en.how much does refinancing cost?: There are no processing charges. Refinancing costs mainly include legal documentation and stamp duty fees. Contact our admin at wa.me/60167177813 for detailed cost breakdowns.
en.how long does refinancing take?: The process usually takes 1 to 3 months, depending on document preparation, property valuations, and bank approvals.
en.what is ccris and ctos?: CCRIS is a record of repayment history, showing loan payments and delinquencies. CTOS checks for legal issues such as bankruptcy or court cases. These are used by banks to assess eligibility.
en.can i cash out from refinancing?: Yes, you can cash out funds during refinancing. The interest rate is 3.8%, and the repayment period is up to 10 years. Our agents can assist you further if needed.
en.what are the interest rates for cash-out: The interest rate for cash-out refinancing is 3.8%, with a repayment period of up to 10 years. Contact our admin at wa.me/60167177813 for more details.
en.what happens after loan approval?: Once approved, you'll be notified and can arrange to sign the loan offer letter. Our agents will assist in finalizing legal documents and completing the process.

ms.apa itu pembiayaan semula?: Pembiayaan semula ialah proses menggantikan pinjaman rumah sedia ada dengan pinjaman baru untuk kadar faedah yang lebih rendah, bayaran bulanan lebih rendah, atau mengeluarkan tunai tambahan berdasarkan nilai hartanah.
ms.dokumen apa yang diperlukan untuk pembia: Anda perlu memberikan butiran seperti Perjanjian Jual Beli, hakmilik hartanah, penyata pendapatan, dan penyata bank. Ejen kami akan menguruskan penilaian, penghantaran dan pemberitahuan keputusan.
ms.berapa kos pembiayaan semula?: Tiada caj pemprosesan. Kos pembiayaan semula merangkumi dokumentasi undang-undang dan duti setem. Hubungi admin kami di wa.me/60167177813 untuk maklumat lanjut.
ms.berapa lama proses pembiayaan semula?: Proses biasanya mengambil masa 1 hingga 3 bulan, bergantung kepada penyediaan dokumen, penilaian hartanah, dan kelulusan bank.
ms.apa itu ccris dan ctos?: CCRIS ialah rekod pembayaran balik, manakala CTOS memeriksa isu undang-undang seperti kebankrapan atau kes mahkamah. Bank menggunakannya untuk menilai kelayakan pinjaman.
ms.bolehkah saya mengeluarkan tunai melalui: Ya, anda boleh mengeluarkan tunai melalui pembiayaan semula. Kadar faedah ialah 3.8% dengan tempoh bayaran balik sehingga 10 tahun. Ejen kami boleh membantu lebih lanjut.
ms.apakah kadar faedah untuk tunai keluar?: Kadar faedah untuk tunai keluar ialah 3.8%, dengan tempoh bayaran balik sehingga 10 tahun. Hubungi admin kami di wa.me/60167177813 untuk maklumat lanjut.
ms.apa yang berlaku selepas kelulusan pinja: Selepas diluluskan, anda akan dimaklumkan dan boleh menandatangani surat tawaran pinjaman. Ejen kami akan membantu menyelesaikan dokumen undang-undang.

zh.什么是再融资?: 再融资是将您现有的房贷更换为新的贷款，通常具有更低的利率、更低的每月还款额或从房产中提取额外资金。
zh.再融资需要哪些文件?: 您需要提供房产买卖协议、产权文件、收入证明和银行账单等详细资料。我们的代理会负责评估、提交和通知审批结果。
zh.再融资需要多少钱?: 再融资没有处理费用，主要包括法律文件和印花税费用。请联系管理员 wa.me/60167177813 获取详细费用信息。
zh.再融资需要多长时间?: 通常需要1到3个月，取决于文件准备、房产评估和银行审批速度。
zh.什么是CCRIS和CTOS?: CCRIS 是还款记录，显示贷款支付和违约情况。CTOS 检查法律问题，例如破产或诉讼。银行使用这些数据评估贷款资格。
zh.我可以通过再融资提取现金吗?: 可以，现金提取的利率为3.8%，还款期限最长为10年。如需更多信息，请联系管理员。
zh.现金再融资的利率是多少?: 现金再融资的利率为3.8%，还款期限最长为10年。如需详细信息，请联系管理员 wa.me/60167177813。
zh.贷款批准后会发生什么?: 批准后，您将收到通知并安排签署贷款合同。我们的代理将协助完成法律文件和流程。
